# NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction.down

**Case**

The value that represents a selection in the down direction, below the current line.

## Declaration

```swift
case down
```

## Navigation directions

- **NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction.forward**: The value that represents a logical forward selection based on the flow of text stored in the document.
- **NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction.backward**: The value that represents a backward selection based on the flow of text stored in the document.
- **NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction.left**: The value that represents a selection in the left direction along the current line.
- **NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction.right**: The value that represents a selection in the right direction along the current line.
- **NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction.up**: The value that represents a selection in the up direction, above the current line.
